ADAPTIVE.DESCRIPTION: An #yAdaptive X effect changes depending on the #ySubtype of the last card played this combat. NL #yIce: apply X #yCold. NL #yWater: gain 2X #yBlock. NL #ySteam: apply X #yHeat.

COLD.DESCRIPTION: A #yCool enemy deals 15% less damage with Attacks. If a #yCool enemy becomes #yHot, remove all #yCool, and apply #yThermal #yShock, and it loses triple its #yCool amount in HP.

CORPOREAL.DESCRIPTION: A Corporeal card is any card that did not start the turn in your hand, draw pile, or discard pile.

EBBING.DESCRIPTION: When an #yEbbing card is discarded from your hand, play it.

FLOW.DESCRIPTION: When you Flow, you may discard any number of cards. You draw that many at the start of your next turn.

Heat.DESCRIPTION: A #yHot enemy takes 30% increased damage from Attacks. If a #yHot enemy becomes #yCool, remove all #yHot, and apply #yThermal #yShock, and it loses triple its #yHot amount in HP.

MUTABLE.DESCRIPTION: When a card is #yTransmuted, any #yMutable effect is passed on to the next card for the rest of combat.

PURITY.DESCRIPTION: Cards grow stronger through the #yTransmutation process. #yBlock gain and damage dealt are increased this combat.

SWAPPABLE.DESCRIPTION: A Swappable card is #yPaired with another card and, while selected, can be freely #ySwapped between the two by pressing #b[hydrologistmod:swap_key].

TRANSMUTE.DESCRIPTION: Transforms a card in combat into any card of the same rarity available to your current run. The new card deals 1 more damage and gains 1 more #yBlock for the rest of combat. This effect stacks.

THERMAL_SHOCK.DESCRIPTION: Whenever #yHeat or #yCold hurts a shocked enemy, the enemy loses extra HP equal to the shocked amount.
